name: RollADie
0:
”Alexa, open Roll A Die!”
”Alexa, roll a die”
”Alexa, ask Roll A Die to spin the die”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roll a die
des: Don't have a die? Don't worry, for Roll a Die! is here. Roll a Die! is a real-time die simulator. Just ask Roll A Die! to roll or spin a die, and enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
